entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -41.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -41.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -46.2°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 42. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 42. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 39.
